name: Clicks Of Courage Demo
description:
a hybrid of RTS and action RPG game. while economic, recruitment, infrastructure development and battles are managed by the AI, player controls a powerfull unit to assist his/her nation to win the war. however player can choose to do anything manually. 

in the RPG side, player needs to level his/her hero up. make it so powerful to defeat enemy's nation. if the hero left behind in level, item shop can boost hero's ability. items ranged from potions, teleportation scrolls, probes, to a devine weapon are available in shops. 

this game also over a story based campaign. 

this is a demo application 

  • campaign limited to level 4
  • skirmish limited to 2 faction or 1 vs 1 maps
  • roster limited to 2 heroes
